item.title: Implementing UUID in ASP.NET Core 8
item.description: In this technical blog, we will look into the implementation of UUIDs in a .NET Core 8 application. We will cover what UUIDs are, their key concepts, how they differ from GUIDs, and provide a detailed example of implementing UUIDs in a .NET Core 8 API project. We will also discuss the advantages and disadvantages of using UUIDs, when to use them, and best practices to follow. What are UUIDs? UUID stands for Universally Unique Identifier.
